list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The latest consignment of books has just arrived.

list_ex_of_english: Enforcement of the legislation governing the health rules for consignments intended for export is the responsibility of the local authority.
The health certification for bone-in beef which must accompany such consignments cannot be completed by the official veterinarian unless such a declaration has been seen.
Information on individual importers and consignments is recorded from customs documents submitted at import.
The police know that drugs have been introduced into legitimate consignments of goods and luggage and recovered when the container has been landed.
Information is not available on the prices at which consignments were imported.
I have not yet been able to procure full information as to the particular consignments referred to in these two questions.
There was the example of consignments which were not collected in time and so missed the boat—a great help to export!
There are no official estimates for the revenue lost through smuggling in freight consignments or by air passengers.
